name: BioBullet
description:
Made for https://itch.io/jam/krassjam4
My theme/prompt was: A shooting game where you listen to soldiers and the name and biography of everybody you kill is displayed onscreen. 

Music is "Just Drive" by Hans Atom
http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/hansatom/39338

Text produced using Tracery 
https://github.com/galaxykate/tracery
